title: Progress Software WhatsUp Gold OnMessage Deserialization of Untrusted Data Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on affected installations of Progress Software WhatsUp Gold. Authentication is required to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the implementation of OnMessage method. The issue results from the lack of proper validation of user-supplied data, which can result in deserialization of untrusted data. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to execute code in the context of SYSTEM.
addtionnal_details: Progress Software has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://community.progress.com/s/article/WhatsUp-Gold-Security-Bulletin-June-2024
timeline:
2024-04-26 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2024-07-03 - Coordinated public release of advisory
2024-07-03 - Advisory Updated
